DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Collecting store sample tissue , saliva , blood patient cancer healthy participant study laboratory may help study cancer future . PURPOSE : This research study collect store tissue sample patient head neck cancer healthy participant .
DOC.brief_title: Tissue Sample Collection From Patients With Head Neck Cancer From Healthy Participants
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Maintain update clinical database pertain diagnosis treatment outcome patient head neck cancer . - Develop repository biospecimens patient . OUTLINE : Tumor tissue sample and/or bronchial washing collect patient undergo plan surgery and/or bronchoscopy , respectively . Buccal swab and/or mouthwash sample saliva sample collect . Patients also undergo blood sample collection baseline every 2-6 month thereafter . Healthy participant contribute blood sample , buccal swab , mouthwash sample baseline . Information medical family history cancer risk factor also collect . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : No limit .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Meets 1 follow criterion : Diagnosis head neck cancer Being treat Vanderbilt University Medical Center cancer Healthy participant PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not specify
